<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxframelowering/#a8ed106468388a207cc54827d72867ddc"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nvptxframelowering/#a8ed106468388a207cc54827d72867ddc">NVPTXFrameLowering::eliminateCallFramePseudoInstr</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ADJCALLSTACKUP instructions.</span></CodeLine>
